subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Another poor performance by Hisanori Takahashi, who allowed six runs against Detroit, may bring calls for the Mets to aggressively pursue a front-line pitcher like Cliff Lee or Roy Oswalt.
snippet: Another poor performance by Hisanori Takahashi, who allowed six runs against Detroit, may bring calls for the Mets to aggressively pursue a front-line pitcher like Cliff Lee or Roy Oswalt.
